FBARN.name: In front of a barn
FBARN.desc: You are in front of a barn. It is completely abandoned; there is no one there.

FIELD.name: Field of corn
FIELD.desc: You are in a field of corn that is yellow, green, and ripe; it looks like someone should be there picking it. There is no one around.

BARN.name: Inside the barn
BARN.desc: The barn has horses, pigs, and cows. There is a saddle sitting next to one of the horse stalls. The cows are looking like they haven't been fed in a while.

Desert.name: The Desert next to the field
Desert.desc: You are in front of a desert, it looks really hot.

Desert Town.name: The Desert Town in the middle of the desert
Desert Town.desc: You are in front of a desert, it looks really hot, and there are lots of people staring. Where did they all come from?

Desert Town Center.name: The Center of the town in the Desert
Desert Town Center.desc: The town center where there is a sand water fountain spraying sand. The people are in old clothes that are ragged and torn, but they look friendly.

Desert Town Bullpen.name: Desert Town Bullpen
Desert Town Bullpen.desc: There are many large white, brown, and black bulls. There is a strange long fence. The people inside say that if you can survive the running of the bulls, you can stay.

End of Town.name: The End of Town
End of Town.desc: Where the finish line is, and the buildings for the town end. The people say that if you can survive the running of the bulls, you can stay.
